page.title: 20Credits
page.content: We would like to thank the following for their help in compiling this project : Anchor Foods Ltd. , the warden and residents of Gainsborough Court , Mrs. Leatherland , Mr Saunders of Godwins Farm , Mr Woolford of Hook Farm and all at the Carrefour Hypermarket and restaurant , the Link Centre , Barratts, Bradleys ,Westbury Homes and Freshbrook School. The project was researched by{classes {2 and 3 (9-11 yrs.) of Lydiard {Millicent School}. Following the unexpected illness of the Headmaster Mr. D.J.Payne the research was organised by Mrs. M.A.Badcott (class teacher) and Simon Badcott (after A levels) who dealt with the editing , computerisation and photography . Finally , we would like to thank all parents and friends of the children involved for their support .
